FLAVOURTEXT.LOCALISED_TEXT: Now you see it, now you’re gone.
Ora lo vedi, ora non ci sei più.
Kaum ist es da, schon bist du weg.
Ahora lo ves y ahora desapareces.
그의 존재를 눈치챘다면 때는 이미 늦었다.
Едва успеешь его увидеть, как тебе конец.
Agora você vê, agora não vê mais.

ACTIVATED_ABILITY.LOCALISED_TEXT: {2}{U}, {T}: Put Void Stalker and target creature on top of their owners’ libraries, then those players shuffle their libraries.
{2}{U}, {T}: Metti l’Errante del Vuoto e una creatura bersaglio in cima ai grimori dei rispettivi proprietari, poi quei giocatori rimescolano i loro grimori.
{2}{U}, {T}: Lege den Leeren Schleicher und eine Kreatur deiner Wahl oben auf die Bibliothek ihrer Besitzer; diese Spieler mischen dann ihre Bibliothek.
{2}{U}, {T} : Mettez le Pisteur du vide et la créature ciblée au-dessus des bibliothèques de leurs propriétaires. Ces joueurs mélangent ensuite leurs bibliothèques.
{2}{U}, {T}: Pon el Acechador del vacío y la criatura objetivo en la parte superior de las bibliotecas de sus propietarios, luego esos jugadores barajan sus bibliotecas.
{2}{U}, {T}：クリーチャー１体を対象とする。虚無の忍び寄りとそれをオーナーのライブラリーの一番上に置き、その後それらのプレイヤーは自分のライブラリーを切り直す。
{2}{U}, {T}: 생물 한 개를 목표로 정한다. 공허의 추적자와 그 생물을 각자 소유자의 서고 맨 위에 놓은 후 그 플레이어들은 서고를 섞는다.
{2}{U}, {T}: положите Пустотелого Преследователя и целевое существо на верх библиотек их владельцев, затем те игроки тасуют свои библиотеки.
{2}{U}, {T}: Coloque Espreitador do Vácuo e a criatura alvo no topo do grimório dos respectivos donos. Depois, aqueles jogadores embaralham seus próprios grimórios.
ACTIVATED_ABILITY.TARGET_DEFINITION: local filter = Object():GetFilter() filter:Clear() filter:AddCardType( CARD_TYPE_CREATURE ) filter:SetZone( ZONE_IN_PLAY ) filter:SetHint( HINT_ENEMY_ONLY, EffectController() )
ACTIVATED_ABILITY.RESOLUTION_TIME_ACTION:
local source = EffectSource() local target = EffectDC():Get_Targets(0):Get_CardPtr(0) if source ~= nil and target ~= nil then source:PutOnTopOfLibrary() target:PutOnTopOfLibrary()
EffectDC():Set_PlayerPtr(1, target:GetOwner()) EffectDC():Set_PlayerPtr(2, source:GetOwner()) end
local other_player = EffectDC():Get_PlayerPtr(1) local you = EffectDC():Get_PlayerPtr(2) if other_player ~= nil and you ~= nil then you:ShuffleLibrary() other_player:ShuffleLibrary() end
